Package dev.jcputney.elearning.parser.impl

Class ZipFileAccess

java.lang.Object
dev.jcputney.elearning.parser.impl.ZipFileAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileAccess, AutoCloseable
public class ZipFileAccess extends Object implements FileAccess, AutoCloseable
An implementation of the FileAccess interface for accessing files within a ZIP archive. This class allows file existence checks, file listing, and retrieving file contents from a ZIP file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ZipFileAccess(String zipFilePath)
    Constructs a new ZipFileAccess instance for the specified ZIP file path.

      Checks if a file exists within the ZIP archive.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      path - The file path to check.
      Returns:

      Lists all files within a specified directory in the ZIP archive.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getFileContents

      public InputStream getFileContents(String path) throws IOException
      Retrieves the contents of a file within the ZIP archive as an InputStream.
      Specified by:
      getFileContents in interface FileAccess
      Parameters:
      path - The file path to retrieve contents from.
      Returns:

      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be read.
